customrecordcustomfield.description: Default device to be used by ScalePay to read credit cards. Users can set a preference for their own default at Set Preferences > Custom Preferences > User Device Preference
customrecordcustomfield.help: Default device to be used by ScalePay to read credit cards. Users can set a preference for their own default at Set Preferences > Custom Preferences > User Device Preference
customrecordcustomfield.label: Use Device

customrecordcustomfield.description: Timeout used when connecting to a card terminal device. Default is 60. (seconds)
customrecordcustomfield.help: Timeout used when connecting to a card terminal device. Default is 60. (seconds)
customrecordcustomfield.label: Timeout

customrecordcustomfield.description: The USAePay URL to connect to when on a SANDBOX NetSuite account. (e.g. https://sandbox.usaepay.com)
customrecordcustomfield.help: The USAePay URL to connect to when on a SANDBOX NetSuite account. (e.g. https://sandbox.usaepay.com)
customrecordcustomfield.label: Sandbox URL

customrecordcustomfield.description: The USAePay URL to connect to when on a non-SANDBOX NetSuite account. Non-sandbox also includes testdrive account. Default should be https://usaepay.com
customrecordcustomfield.help: The USAePay URL to connect to when on a non-SANDBOX NetSuite account. Non-sandbox also includes testdrive account. Default should be https://usaepay.com
customrecordcustomfield.label: Production URL

customrecordcustomfield.description: The id of the NetSuite API secret that will be used to connect to USAePay. Consult the user guide how to generate the API secret value.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The id of the NetSuite API secret that will be used to connect to USAePay. Consult the user guide how to generate the API secret value.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Connection Token Secret

customrecordcustomfield.description: The public api key available in USAePay account. This key is used to generate the USAePay client that processes manually entered card details.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The public api key found in your USAePay account.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Public API Key

customrecordcustomfield.description: The payment method that ScalePay will use for transaction it processes. Default value will be the installed 'ScaleApp Payments' method. (Setup > Accounting > Accounting Lists > Filer: Payment Methods)
customrecordcustomfield.help:
The payment method that ScalePay will use for transaction it processes.
Default value will be the installed 'ScaleApp Payments' method. (Setup > Accounting > Accounting Lists > Filer: Payment Methods)
customrecordcustomfield.label: Payment Method

customrecordcustomfield.description:
The URL of the html file that will be used to process payments from the ScalePay transaction button for CC.
By default this is the preview URL of the file sna_cp_main_manual_pay.html
customrecordcustomfield.help:
The URL of the html file that will be used to process payments from the ScalePay transaction button for CC.
By default this is the preview URL of the file sna_cp_main_manual_pay.html
customrecordcustomfield.label: Payment File URL

customrecordcustomfield.description: The external URL of the ACH payment suitelet deployment. (ScaleApp Payments ACH Pay Page)
customrecordcustomfield.help: The external URL of the ACH payment suitelet deployment. (ScaleApp Payments ACH Pay Page)
customrecordcustomfield.label: ACH Payment File URL

customrecordcustomfield.description:
The accounting item that will be added to transactions for the additional amount assessed when paying via credit cards.
Consider modifying the item's income and expense accounts depending on your accounting team.
customrecordcustomfield.help:
The accounting item that will be added to transactions for the additional amount assessed when paying via credit cards.
Consider modifying the item's income and expense accounts depending on your accounting team.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Non-Cash Adjustment Item

customrecordcustomfield.description:
The bank account where deposited amount will got to once payments has been completely processed in USAePay.
Consult you USAePay representative or accounting team.
customrecordcustomfield.help:
The bank account where deposited amount will got to once payments has been completely processed in USAePay.
Consult you USAePay representative or accounting team.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Deposit Account

customrecordcustomfield.description: The logo that will appear in all ScalePay payment pages.
customrecordcustomfield.help: The logo that will appear in all ScalePay payment pages.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Payment Page Logo

customrecordcustomfield.description: This feature allows payment processing via USAePay credit card payments. This includes card swipe, manual card input, and pay via token.
customrecordcustomfield.help: This feature allows payment processing via USAePay credit card payments. This includes card swipe, manual card input, and pay via token.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Internal Payment Processing

customrecordcustomfield.description: This feature limits payments to pre-authorization of funds via USAePay AuthOnly payment only.
customrecordcustomfield.help: This feature limits payments to pre-authorization of funds via USAePay AuthOnly payment only.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Auth Only/Capture

customrecordcustomfield.description: This feature allows payment processing via USAePay ACH payments.
customrecordcustomfield.help: This feature allows payment processing via USAePay ACH payments.
customrecordcustomfield.label: ACH

customrecordcustomfield.description: This feature makes an external page available to process payment via cash, check, card input and card swipe/scan on plug-in device (Magtek).
customrecordcustomfield.help: This feature makes an external page available to process payment via cash, check, card input and card swipe/scan on plug-in device (Magtek).
customrecordcustomfield.label: (Beta) Field Payment Processing

customrecordcustomfield.description: This feature allows auto charging of open invoices for customers on a fixed schedule via the 'ScaleApp Payments Auto Pay' checkbox on the customer record.
customrecordcustomfield.help: This feature allows auto charging of open invoices for customers on a fixed schedule via the 'ScaleApp Payments Auto Pay' checkbox on the customer record.
customrecordcustomfield.label: (Beta) Auto Pay

customrecordcustomfield.description: This feature allows the use of ScalePay credit card token payment for ScaleNorth custom consolidated invoices via the 'ScaleApp Payments for Consolidated Invoices' page.
customrecordcustomfield.help: This feature allows the use of ScalePay credit card token payment for ScaleNorth custom consolidated invoices via the 'ScaleApp Payments for Consolidated Invoices' page.
customrecordcustomfield.label: (Beta) Custom Consolidated Invoice

customrecordcustomfield.description: 'Swipe Card' button label. If left blank, button label will use default label: 'Swipe Card'.
customrecordcustomfield.help: 'Swipe Card' button label. If left blank, button label will use default label: 'Swipe Card'.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Swipe Card

customrecordcustomfield.description: 'Manual Card Input' button label. If left blank, button label will use default label: 'Manual Card Input'.
customrecordcustomfield.help: 'Manual Card Input' button label. If left blank, button label will use default label: 'Manual Card Input'.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Manual Card Input

customrecordcustomfield.description: 'Pay Via Token' button label. If left blank, button label will use default label: 'Pay via Card-on-File' or 'Get Authorization (Token)' (for auth only sales orders).
customrecordcustomfield.help: 'Pay Via Token' button label. If left blank, button label will use default label: 'Pay via Card-on-File' or 'Get Authorization (Token)' (for auth only sales orders).
customrecordcustomfield.label: Pay Via Token

customrecordcustomfield.description: 'Get Token' button label. If left blank, button label will use default label: 'Get Token'.
customrecordcustomfield.help: 'Get Token' button label. If left blank, button label will use default label: 'Get Token'.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Get Token

customrecordcustomfield.description: Disclaimer shown on ACH payment page
customrecordcustomfield.help: Disclaimer shown on ACH payment page
customrecordcustomfield.label: ACH Disclaimer

customrecordcustomfield.description: customscript_sna_cp_sl_main_ext_pay
customrecordcustomfield.label: Main Payment URL
